title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a REST/OpenAI-compatible API with one-line install.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; installable from PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap OpenAI for any Ollama model in chains/agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, RAG, admin panel); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI that wraps ollama serve with keyboard-driven chat, history, model switching.

title: chatd: Ollama RAG Desktop App
summary: Electron desktop client that adds local document indexing and semantic search on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline code completions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included); available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic Ollama bindings with async support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama (targets .NET 6+); NuGet package includes chat, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; PyPI package llama-index-llms-ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and can summarize selected notes locally.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and NixOS module with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) with tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-helm-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator that watches CRDs to auto-pull and serve Ollama models across clusters.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client library for Ollama using std.http.
